name: The Eighth Letter
description:
In The Eighth Letter you’ll play as a kid trying to grant people wishes. How? Oh… you’ll meet the worshipped monster soon enough. Just launch the game and live it!

The Eighth Letter is a narrative-based game about an ordinary adult remembering their childhood. Wait - I said ordinary? Well… Make your own choices and reveal the 3 endings available.

Edit of 21.04.2020 : added webgl, linux and mac builds
